title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4000.6 - Arbitration procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4000.6 - Arbitration procedure

State Regulations

In every arbitration, after designation of the arbitrator, the board has no authority relative to an arbitrator's relationship with the
parties, hearings, adjournments, procedures, witnesses and awards, which are
matters to be taken up directly with the arbitrator. Arbitrations are governed
by the provisions of article 75 of the Civil Practice Law and Rules of the

State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4000.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
